title: Lower Priority Queue
body: How long do you stay in lower priority queue? Is it like forever or for a short while?

replies.body: It depends on the consistency of games left.  The more games you leave then the higher the timer and required amount of games will be.  Check out our [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) guide for more info too!
